short_desc: Provides a free annual credit report
description: Provides a free annual credit report through phone, mail or online. Also can dispute an item on the Experian Credit Report or check the status of an existing dispute, and receive information or report on matters related to fraud and identity theft.To get a free copy of credit file, go to www.annualcreditreport.com, call 1-877-322-8228 or write to Annual Credit Report Request Service, PO Box 105281, Atlanta, GA 30348-5281. Include name, social security number, current and previous addresses, date of birth and telephone number. Go online to see forms of identification that will be used to verify identity.
